title: Billboards Galore
description: A collection of roadway billboards in different styles and types. Includes sample art.
longDescription:
Here is a collection of roadway billboards to dress up your outdoor levels and street scenes. The collection includes two basic types: metal mono-pole signs and billboards built using wooden poles. The billboards are Blueprinted to make placement and optioning easy. Metal billboards come in three styles: single-sided, double sided, and angled double-sided. The mounting pole can be placed in the center or offset to the side. All metal billboards (except for the poster size) have two height options including normal height and an extra tall version. Metal billboards come in four sizes. These include (from large to small) Bulletin, Small Bulletin, Poster, and Poster Jr..


The wooden billboards come in three sizes (small, medium, large) and two different styles (un-braced and back-braced). The un-braced version can be single-sided or double-sided. The back-braced version is single-sided only. Wooden billboards have the option to add or delete the lighting fixtures. (Wooden billboards are a fixed height.)


All billboards have static lighting set up for them. The Blueprints allow the lighting to be turned on or off.


The package includes six sample billboard images to get you started and new images are easily added. (Create your artwork with a 3.5:1 aspect ratio and then resize to 1024x512 when you're ready to import.)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Nineteen basic sign types/styles
  •  All signs are implemented as Blueprints for easy optioning
  •  Metal mono-pole signs have two height options (regular and extra tall), except for Poster Style
  • Metal mono-pole signs can have center post placed in the center or offset to one side
  • All signs have static lighting that can be turned on or off via a Blueprint option
  • Wooden signs can remove lighting fixtures
  • Two-sided signs can have different images on each side
  • Billboard images are easily changed using a Blueprint option
  • Includes six sample materials for billboard faces
  • Forty-eight different combinations


Texture Sizes:

  •  Most textures are 1024 x 1024
  •  Remainder are 1024 x 512, 1024 x 2048, or 2048 x 2048


Collision: Yes. Mix of simple box and per-poly.

Vertex Count: Varies with sign type and configuration. Double-sided/angled metal monopole has approximately 10,000 vertices (LOD 0).

LODs: Yes

Number of Meshes: 56

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 23

Number of Textures: 21

Supported Development Platforms: Tested on Windows. But should work on all platforms since there's no code - Only blueprints.
